actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to permit the diversion and withdrawal of additional water from Lake Michigan into the Illinois Waterway.

summary.text: Authorizes the diversion and withdrawal of additional water from Lake Michigan into the Illinois Waterway. Requires the Chief of Engineers, Department of the Army, to at all times have direct control and supervision of the amounts of water directly diverted from Lake Michigan under this Act.

titles.title: A bill to permit the diversion and withdrawal of additional water from Lake Michigan into the Illinois Waterway.
